definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Wang Shunsheng and his visiting members visited several water conservancy project sites to learn about the progress of the on-going construction.
sentences.chinese: 王順生一行先後去到多個水利工程現場瞭解建設情況。

sentences.english: Seepage exists widely in earth-rockfill dams in water conservancy projects.
sentences.chinese: 在水利工程中，滲流廣泛存在於土石壩之中。

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Dam is the largest water conservancy project in Yangtze Vally.
sentences.chinese: 三峽大壩是長江流域最大的水利工程。

sentences.english: Qin and Qin Dynasty provided large sums of money for water conservancy project last for many years.
sentences.chinese: 秦國及秦朝持續不斷地興修了大量的水利工程。

sentences.english: Xiaolangdi project is a large hydraulic project with international practice in China.
sentences.chinese: 小浪底工程是我國運用國際慣例建設的大型水利工程。

sentences.english: It is universally available for low-lift drainage and irrigation projects in the plain diked areas.
sentences.chinese: 普遍適用於平原圩區低揚程排澇與灌溉的水利工程。

sentences.english: Thanks to a Gansu-wide water conservancy project carried out twenty years ago, the farmland around Li's village is connected to an irrigation system which draws from the Yellow River.
sentences.chinese: 當地政府二十年前推行水利工程，從黃河引水灌溉。

sentences.english: "Qimen Sanyan" barrage is an ancient water project in Shucheng, Anhui.
sentences.chinese: “七門三堰”是安徽舒城境內古老的水利工程。

sentences.english: The Dujiangyan Irrigation Project was completed around 250 BC during the Warring States Period.
sentences.chinese: 都江堰水利工程修建於公元前250年的戰國時期。

sentences.english: In Hydraulic Engineering, the outflow of weir and sluice is the most common hydraulic phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 在水利工程中，閘堰出流是最爲普遍的一種水力現象。

sentences.english: After rounds of negotiations, the current proposal for supplemental water projects is estimated at more than $1 billion.
sentences.chinese: 幾輪協商後，目前的水利工程的報價超過10億美元。

sentences.english: This water conservancy project eliminated the scourge of floods in this area.
sentences.chinese: 這項水利工程使這一帶的水患得到了根除。

sentences.english: There are four types and ten subtypes of the karst leakage in the hydrotechnics of north Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 黔北水利工程岩溶滲漏可分力四大類十亞類。

definition: to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
